actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture, under certain conditions, to permit borrowers who are farmers to transfer, encumber, or lease property securing certain loans made under provisions of law administered by the Farmers Home Administration.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to permit farmers and ranchers to transfer, encumber, or lease property securing Farmers Home Administration loans made before September 30, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture, under certain conditions, to permit borrowers who are farmers to transfer, encumber, or lease property securing certain loans made under provisions of law administered by the Farmers Home Administration.
